code_snippet:
#[pin_project(PinnedDrop)]
        pub struct $StructName<T, ERR, $($F),*>
        where
            $( $F: Future<Output = Result<T, ERR>>, )*
            ERR: fmt::Debug,
        {
            completed: usize,
            done: bool,
            indexer: utils::Indexer,
            errors: [MaybeUninit<ERR>; $StructName],
            errors_states: PollArray<{ $StructName }>,
            $( #[pin] $F: $F, )*
        }
